text: The Asian Rowing Championship is a rowing championship organised by the Asian Rowing Federation for competitors from the Asian countries. ==Senior Championships== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:100%" Edition Year Host Events 1 1985 Sha Tin, Hong Kong 14 2 1987 Shanghai, China 14 3 1989 Chandigarh, India 14 4 1991 Tokyo, Japan 14 5 1993 , South Korea 14 6 1995 , China 14 7 1997 , Chinese Taipei 14 8 1999 Naganuma, Japan 14 9 2001 Xi'an, China 14 10 2003 , China 14 11 2005 Hyderabad, India 14 12 2007 Chungju, South Korea 14 13 2009 Yilan, Chinese Taipei 14 14 2011 Hwacheon, South Korea 16 15 2013 Lu'an, China 17 Para events from 2015. ==Junior Championships== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:100%" Edition Year Host Events 1 1995 , China 10 2 1996 , 10 3 1997 , Chinese Taipei 10 4 1998 , 10 5 1999 Naganuma, Japan 10 6 2000 , 10 7 2001 , China 10 8 2002 , 10 9 2003 , China 10 10 2004 Nagoya, Japan 10 11 2005 Hwacheon, South Korea 10 12 2006 Singapore, Singapore 10 13 2007 Chungju, South Korea 10 14 2008 Sha Tin, Hong Kong 10 15 2009 Yilan, Chinese Taipei 10 ==Indoor Championships== from 2004. ==Coastal Championships== 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020. ==
